org.deeplearning4j.models.word2vec.wordstore.inmemory

Class InMemoryLookupCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.models.word2vec.wordstore.inmemory.InMemoryLookupCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, VocabCache

    public class InMemoryLookupCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements VocabCache, java.io.Serializable
    In memory lookup cache for smaller datasets
